title: Ticks and Tick-Borne Pathogens Webinar Series
desc: This webinar series is geared towards researchers working on ticks and the bacterial, viral or eukaryotic pathogens they transmit.

title: Introduction to BV-BRC Webinar Series
desc: As part of the launch of the new BV-BRC Beta website, we are offering a webinar series to help new users, as well as PATRIC and IRD/ViPR users, become acquainted with the new website.

title: BV-BRC Public Beta Release
desc: We are pleased to announce the Beta release of the new Bacterial and Viral Bioinformatics Resource Center (BV-BRC).

title: Bioinformatics Resource Center Webinar Series
desc: The Bioinformatic Resource Centers (BRC) have partnered to present a joint webinar series on Respiratory Pathogens and the tools available for their study.

title: New PATRIC Online Bacterial Bioinformatics Course
desc: We have released a new online Bacterial Bioinformatics course, freely available through Coursera.

title: New PATRIC Video Tutorial Series
desc: We have released a series of new video tutorials for PATRIC services and associated functionality.
